creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
description: pond with temple and grounds; silhouette of a 5 storied pagoda; silhouettes of trees in background; branches from willow in foreground
marks: left, cursive jizuri: 自摺　昭和八年作　猿澤池 {jizuri, Shōwa  LRC: よし田 {Yoshida}
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
title: Sarusawa Pond
